newsitem.title: BRAZIL: SOCCER-GOALKEEPER SCORES WITH LAST-MINUTE HEADER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GOALKEEPER SCORES WITH LAST-MINUTE HEADER.

text.p: Guarani goalkeeper Hiran scored with a header in the last minute to salvage a 3-3 draw with Palmeiras in the Sao Paulo championship on Thursday.
Hiran joined the attack when Guarani won a corner in the 90th minute. When the ball was floated across, it eluded Palmeiras goalkeeper Veloso and Hiran, at the far post, headed it into the net.

Five minutes earlier, Hiran nearly scored from a free-kick but his swerving effort, from 25 metres, was tipped round the post by Veloso. Palmeiras led three times during the game but on each occasion Guarani equalised.

Flamengo goalkeeper Ze Carlos also got on the scoresheet for his team as they beat Nacional 6-2 away in a Copa Brasil first round match. Ze Carlos converted a penalty to complete the scoring in a game which also saw striker Romario score twice.
